alert.note: Alert for Southern Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 12 at 10:20AM EST until March 13 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulation of 5 to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In New York, Eastern Columbia County. In Massachusetts, Southern Berkshire County. * WHEN...Through 1 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be hazardous due to snow covered roadways and low visibility. Gusty winds will contribute to blowing and drifting of snowfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour will occur into this afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
